entry.def: Enlistment is the act of joining the army, navy, marines, or air force.

example.ex: Canadians seek enlistment in the US Marines because they don't see as much opportunity in the Canadian armed forces.
example.tran: 加拿大人寻求加入美国海军陆战队，因为他们认为在加拿大军队里机会没那么多。

entry.def: Enlistment is the period of time for which someone is a member of one of the armed forces.

example.ex: At the end of my term of enlistment I decided to return to civilian life.
example.tran: 在我退役的时候，我决定复员过平民生活。

means.word_mean: 1. a period of time spent in military service
